titleStmt.title: Ane breif descriptioun of the qualiteis and effectis of the vvell of the vvoman hil besyde Abirdene
titleStmt.author: Skeyne, Gilbert, 1522?-1599, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Running title reads: The vvell of the vvoman hill.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
